summary: Implements a byte‑level BPE tokenizer modeled after RoBERTa for the MVP language model, converting raw text into token IDs while treating leading spaces as part of tokens and supporting special tokens and prefix‑space handling.
business_intent: Enable preprocessing of text data for MVP models, providing consistent token‑to‑ID mapping, special‑token insertion, and configurable space handling to support downstream NLP tasks such as classification, generation, and masked language modeling.
